channel.title: Uart on Zardam's home
channel.description: Recent content in Uart on Zardam's home

item.title: NumWorks UART Over USB port
item.description: Some people are complaining about the lack of connectivity to the outside world from the calculator, but in fact it is pretty simple to change that. According to the calculator schematics, the USB port of the calculator is wired to PA11 and PA12 of the STM32F412. We have this in the datasheet about these pins : So, it is possible to map an UART on the USB port D+ and D-.
